mapper.insert: insert into T_BARCODE_INFO( bar_code, ord_code, item_id, num, unit, status, create_time )values ( #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{num,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT bi.ord_code ordCode, bi.num ccProdNum, pt.prod_name itemName, pt.prod_spec itemSpec, pt.prod_cgy_code itemCgyCode, oi.item_color itemColor, oi.item_lenth itemLenth, oi.item_num itemNum, oi.item_thick itemThick, oi.item_width itemWidth, oi.item_owner itemOwner FROM T_BARCODE_INFO bi LEFT JOIN T_ORDER_ITEM oi ON bi.item_id = oi.id LEFT JOIN T_PRODUCT pt ON oi.item_code = pt.prod_code WHERE bi.bar_code = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
